sentences.sContent: A bluebird in the garden, a spirit in a house, a kind man on the side of the road.
sentences.sContent_eng: A bluebird in the garden, a spirit in a house, a kind man on the side of the road.
sentences.sCn: 花园中的蓝知更鸟，房屋中的精灵，路边的好人。

trans.tranOther: a small blue bird that lives in North America
